td.label: Proof of Ownership (Utility Bill) or Lease Agreement

t.script:
Sub MaskDate(x)
If x="a" Then If window.event.keyCode <> 8 Then ValidateNumeric(window.event.srcElement) End If end If
If x="b" Then chk_Day_Year(window.event.srcElement) End If
If x="c" Then clear_mask(window.event.srcElement) End If
'Use "d" with the onblur event instead of "b" If date field is not required but needs to be validated If used If x="d" Then j = len(window.event.srcElement.value) If j = 0 Then Exit Sub Else chk_Day_Year(window.event.srcElement) End If End If
End Sub
sub ValidateNumeric(Obj) ObjTxt = Obj.value z = len(ObjTxt) If IsNumeric(right(ObjTxt,1)) or right(ObjTxt,1)="/" Then vdate(Obj) Else If z > 0 Then Obj.value = Left(ObjTxt,z-1) Else Obj.value = "" End If End If
End sub
sub vdate(Obj) ObjTxt = Obj.value z = len(ObjTxt)
If z > 0 Then y = Mid(ObjTxt,z,1)
select Case z Case 1 If IsNumeric(y) = False And trim(y) = "/" Then Obj.value = "" End If
Case 2 If IsNumeric(y) Then 'Msgbox Left(ObjTxt,2) If Cint(Left(ObjTxt,2)) > 31 Then Obj.value = 31 & "/" Else Obj.value = Obj.value & "/" End If Else Obj.value = Left(ObjTxt,1) End If
Case 3 If y <> "/" Then Obj.value = Left(ObjTxt,2) & "/" End If
Case 4 If IsNumeric(y) = False Then Obj.value = Left(ObjTxt,3) End If
Case 5 If IsNumeric(y) Then If Cint(right(ObjTxt,2)) > 12 Then Obj.value = Left(ObjTxt,3) & "12" & "/" Else Obj.value = Obj.value & "/" End If Else Obj.value = Left(ObjTxt,4) End If
Case 6 If trim(y) = "/" Then Else Obj.value = Left(ObjTxt,5) '& "/" End If
Case 7 If IsNumeric(y) = False Then Obj.value = Left(ObjTxt,6) End If
Case 8 If IsNumeric(y) = False Then Obj.value = Left(ObjTxt,7) End If
Case 9 If IsNumeric(y) = False Then Obj.value = Left(ObjTxt,8) End If
Case 10 If IsNumeric(y) = False Then Obj.value = Left(ObjTxt,9) End If
End select End If
If Mid(ObjTxt,3,1) <> "/" And len(ObjTxt) > 2 Then If isnumeric(ObjTxt) Then If Cint(Left(ObjTxt,2)) > 31 Then Obj.value = 31 & "/" Else Obj.value = Left(ObjTxt,2) & "/" End If Else Obj.value = "" End If End If
If Mid(ObjTxt,6,1) <> "/" And len(ObjTxt) > 5 Then If isnumeric(ObjTxt) Then If Mid(ObjTxt,4,2) > 12 Then Obj.value = Left(ObjTxt,3) & 12 & "/" Else Obj.value = Left(ObjTxt,5) & "/" End If Else Obj.value = "" End If End If
End sub
sub chk_Day_Year(Obj)
x=obj.value Dim blnInvalidDate: blnInvalidDate = False
If IsDate(x) And instr(1,x,"/")<>0 And len(x)=10 Then If (Right(x, 4) >= 1753 And Right(x, 4) <= 9999) Then x = Day(x) & "/" & Month(x) & "/" & Year(x) Else blnInvalidDate = True End If Else blnInvalidDate = True End If
If (blnInvalidDate = True) Then msg = "Please Enter a Valid Date" MsgBox(msg,0) End If
End sub
sub clear_mask(Obj) x=obj.value If x = "dd/mm/ccyy" then Obj.value = "" end If end sub
Function vdate2(obj1,obj2)
x = obj1.value y = obj2.value
If IsDate(y) = True And InStr(1,y,"/") > 0 Then StartDate = CDate(x) EndDate = CDate(y) If DateDiff("h",EndDate,StartDate) > 0 Then msg = "Start Date can not be smaller than the End Date." MsgBox(msg,0) vdate2 = False obj2.focus() Exit Function End if Else obj1.focus() End If vdate2 = True End Function
